```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(TPP)
library(Rtpca)
```

```{r}
data("hdacTR_smallExample")
```

```{r}
trData <- tpptrImport(configTable = hdacTR_config, data = hdacTR_data)
```

```{r}
trDataNorm <- tpptrNormalize(data = trData)
```
